items.text: eased with the spin towards cove point.
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: breaks away from length outside off, bunted to point.
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: drifts in to middle and leg, worked to square leg.
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.text: looks to flay this cut but gets a thick outside edge that races past short third man. Raises the half-century stand
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, 2 runs

items.text: stands tall and punches this to sweeper cover.
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.preText: Talha thinks: "This pitch is more like UAE, so they need something like 240ish."
items.text: works this down to long-on for an easy single.
items.shortText: Williams to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: slides one across at length, bunted into the off side.
items.shortText: Williams to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: firmly driven but straight to cover.
items.shortText: Williams to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: sharp turn but this spins back in to beat the pad, good take by Taylor.
items.shortText: Williams to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 wide

items.text: rocks back and pulls this into the gap at deep midwicket. Poor ball, too short and he had all the time in the world to open up the leg side and power this away. Valiant effort by PJ Moor.
items.shortText: Williams to Mohammad Saifuddin, FOUR runs

items.text: eased back to the bowler, who fires a throw to the keeper. Saifuddin was outside the crease and had to scamper back through a dive
items.shortText: Williams to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: dabs this gently from the crease.
items.shortText: Williams to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: sways out of the line of this short delivery but it was sprayed far too wide outside off.
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, 1 wide

items.preText: The roar builds up again. Imrul on 99
items.text: there's his century! What a knock, what celebration! The cradle celebration. The dressing room is up on their feet to acknowledge a crucial knock. He got into of the bounce and turned this short of length delivery into the leg side for a quick single to bring up his landmark
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: turns this wide of midwicket for another quick single.
items.shortText: Tiripano to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.preText: Danial: "Bangladesh needs this pair to carry on the good work till the 45th, then one of these guys need to stay till the end. Zimbabwe has shown great character so far! "
items.text: pulls and misses. This short delivery was angling away, he was through with the stroke way too early.
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: drills this full delivery straight to mid-off.
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: full and angling away, he bunts this into the off side for a quick single.
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: right in his half and he drills this into the gap at deep extra cover. Magnificent timing, even better placement. Raises the 200 for Bangladesh.
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, FOUR runs

items.text: slices this lofted hit on the bounce to sweeper cover.
items.shortText: Chatara to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: appeal for caught behind as he tries to deflect this full delivery wide of the keeper. The sound was that of bat touching the ground. Zimbabwe have reviewed anyway and it comes back a no-ball, so whatever happens after that goes out of the window. Let's move on. Chatara's front foot was on the line and that belongs to the umpire. Free-hit coming up
items.shortText: Chatara to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run
Chatara to Imrul Kayes, 1 no ball

items.text: backs away, makes room and slaps this with all his might but on the bounce to the fielder at deep cover.
items.shortText: Chatara to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: backs away to slap this over point but is beaten
items.shortText: Chatara to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: keeps low as he stands tall to punch, pushed to cover.
items.shortText: Chatara to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run
